== Installation ==
Follow the steps to set up SafeStrap Recovery.  Reboot into Recovery and set up RomSlot 4 with a 2GB data partition.  Install the latest daily snapshot of ubuntu rootfs http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/ubuntu-touch-preview/daily-preinstalled/current/quantal-preinstalled-phablet-armhf.zip followed by the phablet image and reboot.

=== Unlocking instructions ===
Motorola devices have a locked bootloader so custom ROMs are installed using SafeStrap Recovery.  Details on it's use can be found here http://blog.hash-of-codes.com/how-to-safestrap/

=== link to images ===
http://goo.im/devs/Hashcode/targa/ubuntu-phablet
